title: (x) Hunter logo wide caps - various {gang}
content:
Hi Guys,

Before I re-draw this, can anyone identify it? I thought it was like an extended Franklin Gothic, but cant find it anywhere – Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Hunter\_high-res.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141127214850/http:/typophile.com/files/Hunter_high-res.jpg) | 587.14 KB |
author: Richy

comments.content: Akzidenz Grotesk Medium Extended, me thinks.

Looks more like Venus to me, look at the cross bar on the E.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/venus-sb/bold-extended/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141127214850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/venus-sb/bold-extended/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/venus-sb/bold-extended/")
Cheers guys, Venus looks like a winner to me

Also think about ITC Blair Bold

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/blair-itc/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141127214850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/blair-itc/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/blair-itc/")
